meanings.definition: To give someone a particular job or task.
meanings.sent1: The teacher assigns homework every day.
meanings.sent2: She assigns different roles to each student in the play.
meanings.sent3: The robot assigns the task of cleaning to the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, each piece assigns a specific role to the player.
meanings.sent5: The boss assigns the important project to the most experienced team member.

meanings.definition: To transfer legal rights or responsibilities to someone else.
meanings.sent1: The company assigns the copyright of the book to the author.
meanings.sent2: He assigns the lease of the apartment to his friend.
meanings.sent3: The magician assigns the responsibility of pulling a rabbit out of the hat to his assistant.
meanings.sent4: The key assigns the power to unlock the hidden treasure to the chosen one.
meanings.sent5: The judge assigns the ownership of the land to the rightful heir.
